EVP's 
> with high quality  headphones. In the "tomorrow let you know" EVP, I do 
> hear  something...<WBR>.just can't be sure that it is a voi I always  
listen to 
> EVP's with high quality headphones. In the "tomorrow let  you know" EVP, 
I 
> do hear something...<WBR>.just can't be  sure that it is a voice. I does 
> have a cadence similar to someone  speaking, but it could just as easily 
be 
> something present in the  environment-<WBR>a natural background noise. 
There is 
> no  way for me to tell for certain as it is just too feint. I can't make 
>  out any clear words. Sure-I could probably matrix some in, but that is 
all it  
> would be. For an EVP to be considered proof positive of spirit  
> communication by the community at large, it has to be clear enough  that 
many people 
> hear the same thing, without hints or coaxing. If  you have to have high 
> quality devices to make it out, it just isn't  good enough. That does not 
mean it 
> isn't a true EVP, just that it  isn't good enough to stand as evidence. 
As 
> for the whistle, it  sounded like feedback to me as well, but I will have 
to 
> take you word  for it that you were no where near any other electronics 
or 
> EMF's  that could contribute to feedback. Even so, if I am trying to 
remain 
>  unbiased and objective, there is no way for me to say this is a spirit,  
> without personally being with you when you caught it. The only thing  I 
can 
> still say about it is could be, but for me it is non  conclusive. If 
someone 
> does not hear what you are hearing, try to  remain objective and just 
> understand that it isn't personal. You have  to understand that with just 
these 
> recordings alone, there is no way  to scientifically prove what you have 
> recorded is spirit  communication. If you could get consistent, 
intelligent 
> question and  answer recordings, then you would be alot closer. Here 
again, we are 
>  back to the "So what?" thing. You don't HAVE to prove anything 
>  scientifically, unless you want others to completely believe in your
